articles.title: UN "Resolution on Human Rights" against DPRK Rejected: FM Spokesman
articles.content:
UN "Resolution on Human Rights" against DPRK Rejected: FM Spokesman
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Sunday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the adoption of the "resolution" against the DPRK at the UN Human Rights Council:
					 The 25th meeting of the UN Human Rights Council released a "report" of the "Commission of Inquiry" on the human rights situation in the DPRK and railroaded a "resolution" against it.
					
					 The DPRK has not recognized the CI grouping political swindlers, marionettes of the U.S. and the West, and totally opposes and rejects the above-said resolution, a product of the vicious hostile policy towards it.
					
					 Unable to bring down the DPRK by taking issue with it over its nuclear issue only, the U.S. and other hostile forces are making false facts in succession in a bid to intensify "human rights racket" against it to invent an excuse for interfering in its internal affairs and topple down its social system.
					
					 The U.S. and Japan, war criminal states and unethical criminal states with the history of aggression, plunder and murder against other countries and nations in the past, and EU are concealing their past history stained with blood, styling themselves "human rights judges" and resorting to political slander and attack on independent countries, steeped in inveterate repugnancy toward them.
					
					 If human rights are to be discussed sincerely, it is necessary to bring for discussion at international criminal court and punish, first of all, the U.S. aggression of sovereign states including Iraq and Afghanistan, genocide, Japan's past heinous crimes against humanity and misanthropy, racial discrimination, chauvinism and new Nazism rampant in EU countries.
					
					 Human rights precisely mean national sovereignty.
					
					 If politicization of human rights, selectivity and double standards pursued by the U.S. which has no qualification to say about genuine human rights and forces following it are connived at, acts of calling into question specific countries, prompted by political motive, will be more rampant day by day.
					
					 The DPRK will firmly defend the idea and socialist system chosen by itself and continue sincerely discharging its duty in the field of international human rights.

articles.title: Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture and His Party Arrive
articles.content:
Mongolian Minister of Industry and Agriculture and His Party Arrive
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Minister of Industry and Agriculture Khaltmaa Battulga who is chairman of the Mongolian side to the Inter-governmental Committee for Consultation in Economy, Trade, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Mongolia, and his party arrived here on Monday.
					 The government of the DPRK arranged a reception for the Mongolian VIPs that day.

articles.title: National Aerospace Development Administration of DPRK
articles.content:
National Aerospace Development Administration of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- It was one year ago that the DPRK Law on Space Development was adopted at the Seventh Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly.
					 The DPRK has pushed ahead with space development projects to turn the country into a space power, fully exercising its right to peaceful development of the space on a legal basis.
					
					 The National Aerospace Development Administration (NADA) is the country's central guidance institution organizing all the space development projects.
					
					 Its mission is to put into practice the idea and principle of the DPRK government to develop the space for peaceful purpose.
					
					 The emblem of the NADA was recently instituted, which represents its character, mission, position and development prospects.
					
					 Seen in the lower part of the globe-shaped dark blue emblem are white-colored letters "Kukgaujugaebalkuk" (National Aerospace Development Administration) in Korean and in its upper part light blue-colored letters "DPRK" with the Great Bear above them.  Printed in its middle are white-colored letters "NADA" in English.
					
					 Two light blue-colored rings intercrossing the emblem symbolize satellite orbits.
					
					 The Great Bear reflects the will of the space scientists of the DPRK to glorify Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea as a space power.
					
					 The globe represents the DPRK's idea for peaceful development of the space and the rings show the DPRK's will to launch satellite into all orbits.
					
					 Stipulated in the Law on Space Development are the principles of developing the space for peaceful purpose on the basis of adhering to the principle of Juche character and self-reliance, as well as settling the scientific and technological problems necessary for improving the economy and the people's living with space science and technology.
					
					 The law also specifies the position of the NADA and the principles of notification, security, investigation and compensation related with satellite launch.
					
					 The law calls for cooperation with international agencies and other countries on the principle of ensuring equality and mutual benefits, respecting international law and orders for the space.
					
					 Clarified in the law is also the DPRK's principled stand to reject the application of selectivity and double-standards in space activities and the weaponization of outer space.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation of Ministry of Public Health Returns Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation of Ministry of Public Health Returns Home
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Public Health of the DPRK led by Minister Kang Ha Kuk came back home Monday after taking part in the 7th Meeting of the Regional Certification Committee for Polio Eradication organized by the WHO Southeast Asia Regional Office held in New Delhi, India.

articles.title: Vol. 2 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Vol. 2 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Vol. 2 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes", a cycle of revolutionary anecdotes, was published in the DPRK.
					 The book contains revolutionary anecdotes dealing with the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung from June, Juche 15 (1926) to March, Juche 21 (1932), divided into 4 chapters. 
					
					 Contained in the book are anecdotes dealing with the historic facts that during his revolutionary activities at Hwasong Uisuk School Kim Il Sung awakened young people to consciousness, rallied them into one and founded the Down-with-Imperialism Union, a genuine Juche-type revolutionary organization and the first of its kind in Korea.
					
					 Some anecdotes tell that he left the school in mid-course, determined to conduct a dynamic revolutionary struggle in a vast area, and formed and guided the Saenal Children's Union, the first revolutionary children's organization, in Fusong.
					
					 Among them are anecdotes dealing with the facts that he disseminated progressive ideas among broad sections of young people and led them to an anti-Japanese struggle in Jilin, a new area of struggle.
					
					 The book also contains anecdotes telling that he didn't stop his revolutionary activities and explored a new path of struggle even in Jilin prison.
					
					 The book records the anecdotes dealing with the facts that he formed the first Juche-type party organization-the Society for Rallying Comrades and dynamically conducted the struggle to lay a solid mass foundation for the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					  It also contains anecdotes dealing with the revolutionary comradeship and the facts that he energetically led the preparations for founding the Anti-Japanese People's Guerilla Army after formally declaring an anti-Japanese war to annihilate the Japanese imperialists.

articles.title: New Sci-tech Successes for Fruit Cultivation
articles.content:
New Sci-tech Successes for Fruit Cultivation
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- New sci-tech successes have been applied to fruit cultivation in the DPRK to prove successful.
					 Compound insecticide, made with nano-dispersant developed by the Pyongyang Natural Perfume Institute, has been introduced to growing fruit trees.
					
					 The insecticide is more efficacious against insects than the existing chemicals and effective in preventing environmental pollution.
					
					 The introduction of amino acid micronutrient compound fertilizer also makes it possible to increase fruit output with less consumption of chemical fertilizers. And newly developed sulfur-compound germicide has proved more effective than the existing ones.

articles.title: U.S. Should Give Up Worn-out Doctrine of "Threat from North Korea": KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Should Give Up Worn-out Doctrine of "Threat from North Korea": KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is busy with advocating the threadbare doctrine of "threat from north Korea".
					 The U.S. ambassador to south Korea, the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the commander-in-chief of the U.S. Armed Forces in the Pacific region termed the planned military drills launched by the DPRK "provocation" and "threat".
					
					 Some days ago, U.S. President Obama said in Hague that "north Korea's threat and provocations will be answered with a unified response."
					
					 All those remarks remind one of a thief crying "Stop thief!" as it is none other than the U.S. who is now carrying on large-scale joint military drills in the sky, in the sea and on the land of south Korea under pretext of someone's "provocations".
					
					 It is an American-style logic to interpret a nuclear war drill aimed at invading others as "annual" and "defensive" and others' strengthening of war deterrent for defending their sovereignty and territories as "provocation". It can not be construed otherwise than a sheer sophism which can work on nobody.
					
					 The U.S. has regarded aggression and interference as its mainstay for forming and keeping itself while habituating itself to posing threat and making provocations against other countries. And such old habit is driving the U.S. to considering any hurdles to it as threat and provocations. Therefore, nobody can lodge an objection against the fact that the U.S. political thinking and judgment are confused with an extreme contradiction and delusion of persecution.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. has become evermore vicious in anti-DPRK campaign under the pretext of "threat" and "provocations", taking issue with it in all aspects including ideology and social system, economy, national defense, culture and human rights.
					
					 All these moves are prompted by an evil plot to justify and materialize its policy of war against the DPRK at any cost, so as to politically stamp out, economically isolate and militarily stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It is well evidenced by the "Quadrennial Defense Review" released by the U.S. Defense Department some days ago, which calls for gaining "arms supremacy for winning decisive victory" over the DPRK after terming it "a state posing direct threat" and a "biggest rival". The chief of Staff of the U.S. Army, too, in his speech made the outbreak of a war on the Korean Peninsula as a fait accompli to incite a war fever.
					
					 So, the U.S. is hell-bent on escalating tensions in a bid to find an excuse for materializing its policy of aggression on the DPRK while branding its every practice, including its policy and efforts for peace and prosperity, as "provocation" and "threat".
					
					 But the U.S. twisted way of thinking only drives it into an abyss of self-contradiction, a result of its anachronistic judgment and illogical policy.
					
					 The longer the U.S. engages itself in clinging to the already worn-out doctrine of "threat from north Korea", the earlier the DPRK will bring its final victory.

articles.title: WPK's New Strategic Line Is Ever-Victorious Banner: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
WPK's New Strategic Line Is Ever-Victorious Banner: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an editorial to the 1st anniversary of the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force advanced at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The March plenary meeting paved a wide avenue to settle accounts of long-term confrontation with the U.S. and bring earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu, while firmly taking the initiative with the powerful driving force, the editorial says.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The WPK's new strategic line made it possible to defend the dignity of the country and the nation and firmly protect the idea and the social system of the DPRK under the unprecedented grim situation and difficulties and usher in a new era of prosperity.
					
					 The WPK's advancement of the new strategic line was a grand gunfire heralding that socialist Korea of Juche has entered into a phase of final victory to realize the people's dream and ideal on the basis of the powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The WPK, the great defender of independence and justice, has led the struggle to carry out the new strategic line, overcoming all pressures and challenges of the enemy with matchless courage and pluck.
					
					 The line has been thoroughly embodied and its validity and vitality have been fully demonstrated in the past one-year revolutionary practice thanks to the WPK's tested leadership and the indomitable struggle of all service personnel and people.
					
					 The line serves as a treasured sword of independence which helped firmly defend the dignity of the DPRK and powerfully demonstrate the might of the DPRK, an impregnable fortress.
					
					 The DPRK has cleared a dark cloud of war hanging over it and reliably defended the independent dignity and security of the country and its people by dint of self-defensive war deterrent under the unfurled banner of the new strategic line.
					
					 The line serves as a motive force of leap forward and prosperity which brought about great advance in building an economic power and highly civilized state of Korean style and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Since the line was legalized, the DPRK has directed more manpower and material potentials to economic construction on the basis of the firm military guarantee.
					
					 The line is also a precious wealth common to the entire Korean nation and mankind conducive to bringing earlier the building of a reunified power and ensuring regional and global stability and development.
					
					 The DPRK's powerful self-defensive capabilities are carrying out the historic mission actively contributing to ensuring the balance of strength on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity and achieving peace and prosperity of the world.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the WPK's line which contains the lesson and truth of history and indicates the way ahead will be proved more powerfully day by day.
					
					 The situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula and the DPRK's struggle over the past one year eloquently prove that to carry out the new strategic line is the only way and shortcut to the final victory. Victory and glory are in store for those with strong will invariably taking the road of justice chosen by themselves.
					
					 The WPK's new strategic line is the ever-victorious banner.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Validity and Vitality of WPK's New Strategic Line
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Validity and Vitality of WPK's New Strategic Line
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The new strategic line on pushing forward economic construction and building of nuclear force simultaneously was advanced at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article says the validity and vitality of the WPK's new strategic line have been clearly proved in the past one year.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the line are clearly manifested in serving as the powerful treasured sword for preventing a war and firmly defending the sovereignty of the nation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers prodded the UN Security Council to cook up "resolutions on sanctions" on the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes. At the same time, they got frantic in the moves to ignite a war with huge forces for aggression involved. But the U.S. imperialists dared not unleash a war of aggression, yielding to the great unity of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are rallied close around the WPK and its powerful war deterrent.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the line are also powerfully demonstrated in the drive to build an economic power and improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 The WPK advanced the new strategic line as required by the developing revolution and legalized it. The legalization of the line makes it possible for the Korean people to push forward the building of an economic power with mind at ease by dint of powerful war deterrent no matter how the situation may change.
					
					 Last year the service personnel and people of the DPRK made miracles and feats in the drive for the country's prosperity while shattering the U.S. confrontational moves against it and pushing forward the building of an economic power simultaneously in the same spirit as they occupied space and with the same stamina as they succeeded in high-grade nuclear test.
					
					 The facts prove that the final victory for the building of a thriving nation lies in carrying through the WPK's new strategic line.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Supports WPK's New Strategic Line
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Supports WPK's New Strategic Line
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- One year has passed since Marshal Kim Jong Un set forth the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The new strategic line is a valuable crystal brought by the unshakable faith and will of the illustrious brilliant commander to finally settle accounts with the U.S. through an all-out confrontation with it which has wantonly infringed upon the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation century after century, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The WPK's line associated with the courage of Mt. Paektu, matchless stratagem, steadfast faith and steel-strong will has become the immortal banner dynamically arousing all Koreans to a nation-wide struggle against the U.S.
					
					 The line is strategic one to foil outside forces' pressure and challenges of aggression, firmly protect the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation and reunify the country in the spirit of bold offensive.
					
					 The DPRK's peaceable efforts for building a thriving nation have been accompanied by an acute struggle against hostile forces.
					
					 The U.S. doesn't want to see the Koreans being well off in a reunified country.
					
					 It is leaving no means untried to disarm the DPRK of its nuclear weapons and topple its social system. It has become evermore undisguised in its moves to stamp out the DPRK politically, isolate it economically and stifle it militarily.
					
					 The more desperately the U.S. is engaged in its carrot-and-stick operations against the DPRK, talking about "abandonment of nukes", the more tightly the service personnel and people of the DPRK will take the nuclear treasured sword and stage a dynamic struggle for protecting the sovereignty of the nation and reunifying the country independently and peacefully.
					
					 No one is entitled to find fault with the WPK's new strategic line as it is not stopgap one but strategic one to be constantly held fast to.
					
					 One can defend justice only when one returns the nukes with nukes. 
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence is not ghost-like one which should be dismantled unless the U.S. recognizes it and which exists only when the latter recognizes it. Both time and justice take sides with the DPRK armed with nuclear deterrence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S.-Japan-south Korea Military Alliance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S.-Japan-south Korea Military Alliance
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, U.S. President Obama had an anti-DPRK nuclear confab with the Japanese prime minister and the south Korean chief executive in the wake of the Third Nuclear Security Summit held in Netherlands. There, he blustered that the DPRK's access to nukes cannot be allowed. He even called for intensifying the cooperation system among the U.S., Japan and south Korea, adding the military cooperation including joint drills and MD system should be incorporated in it.
					 The tripartite summit held by the U.S. under the pretext of "coping with the DPRK's nukes" is a revelation of its ulterior motive to hurt and stifle the DPRK and realize its strategy of aggression against Asia by tightening the triangular military alliance of the U.S., Japan and south Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Such move of the U.S. is very risky as it has become a root cause of instability and military tensions on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 It also swims against the trend towards dialogue and detente.
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that the U.S. has deliberately spoiled the atmosphere of the inter-Korean dialogue by intensifying the Foal Eagle joint military drills with south Korea and, at the same time, put pressure upon the south Korean authorities to improve relations with Japan which have been estranged due to the issue of history and supported Japan's move to revive militarism and its exercise of the "right to collective self-defense", egging it on to reinvasion.
					
					 The U.S.-Japan-south Korea summit which was held at the initiative of Obama is being protested by Koreans and other people in the world, arousing due vigilance. This will certainly entail negative consequences disturbing the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia and increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The more desperately the U.S. intensifies its cooperation with Japan and the south Korean authorities to invade the DPRK, groundlessly taking issue with it over its "nuclear threat", the more clearly this will bring to light the vicious colors of the U.S. as a mastermind of the escalated tensions on the peninsula and a nuclear war maniac.
					
					 The U.S. should bear this in mind.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Serves Treasured Sword for Ensuring Peace, Building Economic Power: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent Serves Treasured Sword for Ensuring Peace, Building Economic Power: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Nuclear deterrent of the DPRK serves as a treasured sword for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula and building an economic power, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Monday.
					 The DPRK has taken measures to bolster up its nuclear deterrent in order to check the U.S. increased nuclear threat and war moves, ensure peace and protect the security and sovereignty of the country, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Now that the rival of the DPRK is the U.S. which has nuclear weapons more than any other countries in the world, posing constant nuclear threats to the DPRK, it should strengthen its muscle both in quality and quantity to deter the threats. Peace, prosperity and the happy life of the people can be provided only by powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK has boosted its nuclear force to end the more than half a century-long U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail and mercilessly blow up the dens of aggression once a war breaks out. The mission of the DPRK's nuclear force is to let the Korean people live in luxury and comfort under socialism to their heart's content safely in the nuclear power.
					
					 The nuclear deterrence of the DPRK is neither a political bargaining chip nor a means of economic dealing. It is the life and soul of the nation and national treasure of reunified Korea which can never be bartered with anything.
					
					 It provides a sure guarantee for defending peace and security not only in the Korean peninsula but in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 As the U.S. is waiting for a chance to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK while escalating nuclear threat to it as the days go by, the DPRK was compelled to bolster up its nuclear deterrent both in quality and quantity. This is the exercise of the just right of self-defence and the peaceful measure from A to Z.
					
					 No matter what others may say and as long as the U.S. has persistently threatened the DPRK with nukes, it will hold fast to the strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: Suppression of Railway Trade Union Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Railway Trade Union Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- At least 4 000 members of the Railway Trade Union of south Korea held a rally at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station on Mar. 25 for vowing a general strike in protest against the Railway Company's suppression of the trade union, according to the south Korean paper Hangyore.
					 At the rally speakers said the Railway Company is resorting to such suppression as massive disciplinary measures and reparation for damage as they staged a strike in protest against privatization of railway service. This is entirely a retaliatory suppression, they noted.
					
					 They declared they would no longer connive at the act of the company engrossed in suppression only after turning down the demand of the trade union.
					
					 Then, Chairman Kim Myong Hwan and more than 100 trade unionists held a ceremony for having their hair cut and strongly protested against the company's suppression.
					
					 They decided to have their hair cut in order to oppose the privatization of railway service and realize the demand of the trade union, they said, stressing that they would continue the general strike in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at Gangsterism of S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at Gangsterism of S. Korean Puppet Army
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- All the service personnel and people of the DPRK have been enraged at the news that the south Korean puppet navy gangsters intruded into the territorial waters of the DPRK side before forcibly capturing a fishing boat of the DPRK and committing outrages on its crew.
					 Yun Jong Bom, an officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), told KCNA:
					
					 The south Korean puppet military gangsters pounced upon a small fishing boat at midnight, threatened its crewmen with warning shots and beat them with iron bars.
					
					 It seems that the gangsters have forgotten the Yonphyong Island shelling Incident. If their crazy acts were tolerated, nobody can predict what consequences would be entailed.
					
					 With this incident as an occasion, we should have to sweep away the group of gangsters of the second Fleet of the puppet navy on Paekryong Island by showering a fire of revenge.
					
					 Chae Mu Jin, a researcher of the Law Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, said:
					
					 The south Korean military gangsters' acts of forcibly carrying away and detaining our fishing boat and forcing defection on its crewmen are a heinous crime which should be severely punished.
					
					 The group of Park Geun Hye should immediately make apology to the DPRK and the international community for their brutality and harshly punish the culprits involved in it. If not, the army and people of the DPRK will surely reduce the dens of gangsters including Paekryong Island into a sea of flames by opening the floodgates of their resentment.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are to wholly blame for it. 
					
					 Pak Chang Son, a student at Kanggye University of Agriculture and Forestry, said:
					
					 As a discharged soldier, I am eager to take up arms again to shoot all those gangsters on Paekryong Island.
					
					 It is not a matter of difficulty to wipe out the group of pirates on the island.
					
					 I think the evil practices can never be repeated only when all of the plot-breeding bases, including the five islands in the West Sea, are ruined.

articles.title: S. Korean Military's Piracy Flailed as Product of Confrontation Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Military's Piracy Flailed as Product of Confrontation Policy
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- All the servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK have got angry to hear that the south Korean military gangsters forcibly seized a fishing boat of the DPRK, committing outrages on its crewmen, on the territorial waters of the DPRK side in the West Sea of Korea.
					 Ko Nung Du, director of the Maritime Administration, told KCNA:
					
					 It is an international usage to rescue the crew of any ship, distressed by engine breakdown or collision, fire and sinking, on the sea and offer convenience to them in view of humanitarianism.
					
					 But the south Korean navy gangsters committed atrocities against our sailors in distress. Their heinous action is a product of the anti-DPRK hostile policy.
					
					 The south Korean military should severely punish all those involved in the recent piracy, including the masterminds.
					
					 Hwang Chol Su, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 We can never pardon the south Korean military hooligans who beat our defenseless sailors with iron bars to fall in a faint and pressured them to "defect".
					
					 A shower of fire for revenge should be inflicted on the mad and cruel guys in Paekryong Island at once. If our strike of justice is launched, there will be no longer any organism in the den of evils in a few seconds.
					
					 Pak Chol, a worker of the Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326, said:
					
					 The blame for the barbarous piracy rests entirely with the authorities and the military brasshats of south Korea. The Park Geun Hye group, getting hell-bent on the war exercises against the fellow countrymen in league with the U.S., can never evade the responsibility for the recent case.
					
					 Only the use of force is needed to settle accounts with the south Korean puppet forces engrossed in hideous provocations to the DPRK.

articles.title: Successful Election of Deputies to SPA Lauded by British Organizations
articles.content:
Successful Election of Deputies to SPA Lauded by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on March 10 as regards the successful election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK. 
					 The successful election of deputies to the 13th SPA of the DPRK is another great event of socialist Korea of Juche, the statement said. 
					
					 This is the success which is hardly imaginable in capitalist society where confrontation and division are rampant, it noted.
					
					 The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is enjoying absolute support of the people, was elected a deputy to the 13th SPA of the DPRK at Paektusan Constituency No. 111 by obtaining 100 percent of the vote, it said, adding:
					
					 We extend the warmest congratulations to him. 
					
					 The election of the deputies to the 13th SPA of the DPRK strikingly demonstrated the might of the single-minded unity of all the people united close around the party and the leader, and showed the DPRK is a great harmonious family. 
					
					 The election proved the advantages of the popular election system of the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK will dynamically advance toward the final victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personages of Bangladesh, Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personages of Bangladesh, Myanmar 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi and Myanmar personages made public statements on March 22 and 24 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun). 
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said: 
					
					 The Day of the Sun is a common holiday of not only the Korean people but progressive mankind.
					
					 The President founded the immortal Juche idea to show a bright way for mankind and built socialism centered on the popular masses in the DPRK to realize the centuries-old desire of the Korean people to live in society free from exploitation and oppression. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will achieve bigger successes in the drive for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, paid wholehearted tribute to the President, the great leader of the Korean people, and extended warm congratulations to all the Korean people. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a prominent leader and iron-willed commander who put an end to the Japanese imperialist colonial rule, liberated Korea, built a socialist power and victoriously led the human cause of independence. 
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, is leading the struggle of the party, army and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 I extend support and solidarity to the Korean people who have turned out in the drive for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country true to the idea and cause of the President and HE Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Romania 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Bucharest on March 24. 
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 It set the celebration period from April 1 to 15 and decided to organize various political and cultural events.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Indonesia 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Jakarta on March 25. 
					 Eko Suryo Santjojo, general chairman of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 It set the celebration period from March 25 to April 17 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including seminar and photo exhibition.

articles.title: Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by Mexican Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by Mexican Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, made public a statement on Mar. 19 in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 He said:
					
					 The People's Socialist Party of Mexico fully supports the statement the NDC of the DPRK released to cope with the U.S. maneuvers, regarding it as an expression of the independent and patriotic stand of the government and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S., head of the imperialists, is seriously engaged in aggression, plot-breeding and arbitrariness against other countries by force and styles itself an "international gendarme" and a "police officer" of humankind. These unpardonable acts, however, do not have any legal, historical and moral value.
					
					 All progressive people point an accusing finger at the U.S. for its hypocritical act of styling itself a "human rights judge" without feeling any slightest compunction of conscience even though it facilitated and engineered coups to overturn legitimate governments and social systems in other countries, killed innocent people irrespective of sex and age and inflicted pain on them on the strength of "mightiness" which it acquired before and after the Second World War.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are already on their downhill turn and are being thrown deep into the garbage ground of history.
					
					 The Korean people will certainly achieve a victory in the new offensive aimed at terminating the U.S. ceaseless provocations with an indomitable will as they did in the 1950s.
					
					 The People's Socialist Party of Mexico sends firm solidarity again to the heroic Koreans led by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Statement of NDC of DPRK Favored by South African Personages
articles.content:
Statement of NDC of DPRK Favored by South African Personages
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- South African figures released statements on Mar. 21 and 25 in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who doubles as chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said:
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK is the most ferocious policy to undermine the ideology and bring down social system of the DPRK by dint of American-style democracy and market economy and swallow up the Korean nation and territory by force.
					
					 We demand the U.S. discontinue the nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK and immediately stop the groundless "human rights" racket kicked up as part of its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should totally stop the farce of hurting the dignity of the DPRK which it conducts with the involvement of human scum who are more dead than alive.
					
					 A secretary for the northern area of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa said:
					
					 The escalating military tensions and the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula are entirely attributable to the U.S. persistent hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will steadily beef up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence and take a series of additional measures to demonstrate its might as long as the U.S. continues nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK. This strong stand of the DPRK is greatly encouraging us.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is bound to go bust as it is pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme phase despite the sincere efforts of the DPRK.

articles.title: Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of NDC of DPRK Supported by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association expressed full support for the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK in their joint statement on Mar. 15.
					 The U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, have long enforced the hostile policy towards the DPRK, the statement said.
					
					 They have posed military threats and imposed sanctions on the DPRK in order to pull down the people-centered socialism based on the Juche idea, it noted.
					
					 They should discontinue the nuclear threat and lift sanctions against the DPRK, stop the war drills for aggression and withdraw their forces from south Korea, it stressed.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence is neither a bargaining chip for improving the relations with the U.S. nor a means which exists only when the U.S. recognizes it, the statement said.
					
					 The DPRK has made patient efforts for the peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula, but the U.S. and the south Korean authorities continue escalating tensions, it noted, adding:
					
					 All the measures taken by the DPRK are the exercise of its independent right.
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. immediately roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Favored by International Community
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Favored by International Community
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The international community is fully supporting the just cause of the Korean people and strongly denouncing the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 No sooner had the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK released a statement clarifying its stand on the prevailing situation than foreign media gave wide publicity to it under the titles "The NDC of the DPRK clarifies its stand on the U.S. hostile policy toward it", etc. They included the Chinese Xinhua news agency, Russian ITAR-TASS, Iranian Press TV, the Uruguayan paper La Juventud and the website of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK. 
					
					 At least 100 political parties and organizations and public figures of foreign countries issued statements to support the principled stand of the DPRK. They included the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, National Democratic Congress of Ghana, Sind State Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party, Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain and the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The Maritime Territory branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity", National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, and other organizations and institutions of various countries held meetings for solidarity and launched demonstrations and protests.
					
					 Voices supporting the just cause of the Korean people were heard at the solidarity meetings. Decisions and letters were adopted there demanding the U.S. roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and totally stop joint military exercises for aggression.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On Abolishing the Tax System" was posted by the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Switzerland on its website on March 18. 
					 The work, published on March 21, Juche 63 (1974), clarifies the fact that all conditions for abolishing the tax system were provided in the DPRK in those days. It also expounds the significance of the abolishment of the tax system and the contents of the decision of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on abolishing the tax system.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia proceder ilegal de ONU
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia proceder ilegal de ONU
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica ayer una declaracion para condenar el acto ilegal de la ONU que cuestiona los justos ejercicios de lanzamiento de cohetes del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Hoy dia, los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC de prevenir la nueva guerra y asegurar la paz y la estabilidad en la Peninsula Coreana se enfrentan con el grave desafio de las fuerzas hostiles, inicia la nota y prosigue:
					
					En la llamada reunion consultiva extraoficial sostenida el dia 28 a peticion urgente de EE.UU., el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU perpetro un acto ilegal y provocador de cuestionar injustamente y "condenar" los ejercicios arriba citados.
					
					El lanzamiento de cohetes constituye el entrenamiento de caracter autodefensivo de nuestro ejercito para hacer frente a la grave situacion en que se intensifican dia a dia la persistente politica hostil anti-RPDC del imperio y sus entrenamientos de guerra nuclear de caracter agresivo.
					
					A pesar de que se va creando este ano en la Peninsula Coreana el ambiente de alivio gracias a los iniciativos y pacificos esfuerzos de la RPDC, el imperio norteamericano desplego por fin junto con los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle movilizando inmensos efectivos agresores y los pertrechos mortiferos.
					
					Se ampliaron poco a poco su dimension y peligrosidad y en el simulacro Ssangryong, iniciado el 27 del marzo pasado, tomaron parte las tropas de maxima envergadura despues de 1993 con la meta principal de "ocupar Pyongyang".
					
					Es muy natural que el EPC, cuya su mision es defender la seguridad y la paz del pais y pueblo, disponga de los preparativos completos para enfrentarse a la creada situacion severa.
					
					Sin embargo, el CS da vista gorda a los freneticos ejercicios de guerra nuclear del imperio, pero trata de tomar otra vez una "medida adecuada" tras cuestionar ese lanzamiento de cohetes como "violacion de resolucion" y "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales", lo cual deviene un proceder intolerable.
					
					Las "resoluciones" del CS son el producto de la politica hostil anti-RPDC del imperio y estan penetradas por las demandas bandidescas de arrebatar hasta el derecho a lanzar los satelites con fines pacificos atentando flagrantemente la soberania de la RPDC y la seguridad nacional.
					
					Por tal motivo, tan pronto como se adoptaron esas "resoluciones", la RPDC las rechazo totalmente y no esta restringida nunca a ellas.
					
					Se dara el resultado erroneo si se mide con una regla erronea.
					
					Es por eso que se produce el fenomeno irracional de considerar como "provocacion" los esfuerzos de la RPDC por preservar la seguridad del pais y la nacion y de describir como "defensa de paz" las agresivas maniobras del imperio encaminadas a provocar la guerra nuclear.
					
					Solamente causara la agravacion de la tension y el conflicto en vez de hacer aporte a mantener la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region, si el Consejo de Seguridad siga portandose sin imparcialidad segun el guion del imperio y negando persistentemente nuestro legitimo ejercicio de derechos con las "resoluciones" muy injustas. 
					
					Para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la agravacion de tension y buscar el pretexto de incremento de fuerzas armadas segun su estrategia de dar prioridad a Asia-Pacifico dando destaque a la "amenaza" de la RPDC, EE.UU. sometio al CS el caso de lanzamiento de cohetes de la RPDC para condenarlo.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. siga recurriendo a las maquinaciones de aislar y aplastar a la RPDC abusando del CS partiendo de sus intereses estrategicos, tambien tenemos el derecho a autodefendernos y estamos preparados para ello.
					
					Dado que EE.UU. desarrolla sin parar los entrenamientos de guerra nuclear describiendolos como "anuales" al movilizar diversos medios de ataque nuclear con la meta de "conquistar Pyongyang", se incluiran tambien en nuestros ejercicios los adiestramientos de diversas formas para emplear los disuasivos nucleares mas diversificados con diferentes poderios de ataque contra los blancos de mediana y larga distancia.
					
					Frente al caso de que el imperio vuelva a tomarlo como "provocacion", la RPDC esta dispuesta para tomar las medidas de otras fases inimaginables por los enemigos.
					
					Ademas se incluira la prueba nuclear de nuevo tipo para intensificar mas el disuasivo nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia. 
					
					Si ocurre un estado catastrofico no deseado por nadie en la Peninsula Coreana, el imperio estadounidense se responsabilizara totalmente de ello.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida con motivo de que quedo aprobada una "resolucion" anticoreana en la reunion del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio la vispera a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					En la 25a reunion del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, se publico el llamado "informe" de la "comision de investigacion" sobre la situacion de DDHH en la RPDC y se aprobo tambien de modo coercitivo una "resolucion" contra ella.
					
					Desde el principio, no reconocemos esa "comision", grupo de estafadores politicos que no pasan de ser titeres de EE.UU. y el Occidente, y rechazamos y repudiamos categoricamente de punta a cabo la "resolucion de DDHH" aprobada esta vez como producto de la brutal politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					Impotentes de doblegar a la RPDC cuestionando solo el problema nuclear, EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles amplian mas alla del limite su "campana de DDHH" anti-RPDC inventando de continuo los hechos y tratan asi de buscar el pretexto de intervencion en los asuntos internos de ella y derrocar su regimen.
					
					EE.UU., Japon y la Union Europa, paises criminales de guerra y Estados delincuentes anti-eticos que escribieron la historia de agresion, saqueo y genocidio contra otros paises y naciones, encubren hoy dia esos ensangrentados antecedentes arrogandose el papel de "jueces de DDHH" y se dedican a criticar y atacar en el plano politico a los paises independientes partiendo de su veto cronico a estos.
					
					Para hablar de verdad de los DDHH, habria que someter primero al organo internacional de juicio penal e imponer castigos sobre la agresion y el genocidio de civiles cometidos por EE.UU. en Irak, Afganistan y otros Estados soberanos, los peores crimenes de lesa humanidad cometidos en el pasado por Japon y la misantropia, la discriminacion racial, la xenofobia, la profanacion y el neonazismo que campean en los paises de la Union Europea.
					
					Los DDHH son los derechos del Estado.
					
					Si se toleran la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero, que aplican en materia de DDHH EE.UU. y sus satelites que ni siquiera tienen calidad de hablar de los verdaderos DDHH, se tornaran cada vez mas graves los actos de cuestionar a los paises determinados por motivos politicos.
					
					Nuestro pais seguira cumpliendo sinceramente su deber asumido en la rama internacional de DDHH defendiendo con firmeza su idea y regimen socialistas optados por si mismo.

articles.title: Mujeres coreanas de Norte, Sur y en ultramar juran librar lucha conjunta
articles.content:
Mujeres coreanas de Norte, Sur y en ultramar juran librar lucha conjunta
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Las representantes de las entidades femeninas de distintos estratos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar realizaron en Shenyang de China el seminario de las mujeres del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar para resolver el problema de esclavitud sexual del ejercito japones y publicaron el dia 29 una resolucion conjunta.
					  La nota exhorta a todas las mujeres del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar a hacer balance general del crimen agresivo de Japon, frenar rotundamente su intento de rehabilitacion del militarismo y reagresion y abrir al frente nueva coyuntura del desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur, la paz y la prosperidad bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y prosigue:
					
					  Desarrollaremos con mas dinamismo la lucha y las actividades solidarias por divulgar ampliamente a la sociedad internacional el caso de crimen de esclavitud sexual del ex ejercito japones y recibir las disculpas e indemnizacion del gobierno japones.
					
					  A traves del acto de denuncia, el seminario, el foro de testimonio, la galeria de fotos, el movimiento de firma y otras actividades, revelaremos y condenaremos a todo el mundo el crimen antietico cometido por  Japon contra las coreanas y desarrollaremos con dinamismo la lucha por hacer balance general del crimen de esclavitud sexual de japon solidarizandose con distintos estratos internos y externos del pais.
					
					  Seguiremos elevando la voz de protesta contra el crimen belico inhumanitario de Japon en la sociedad internacional en solidaridad con las entidades femeninas progresistas y las personalidades de Japon, los paises asiaticos y los demas danados por el caso de la esclavitud sexual del ex ejercito japones, las organizaciones internacionales y las entidades de defensa de los derechos humanos del mundo.
					
					  Desplegaremos activamente la lucha por que las autoridades japonesas pidan disculpa e indemnicen sobre todos los crimenes cometidos durante el periodo de dominio colonial del pasado.
					
					  Cobraremos hasta el fin la disculpa sincera y la indemnizacion cabal sobre el crimen del Estado de toda indole.
					
					  Ademas libraremos vigorosamente la lucha conjunta por rescatar las preciosas reliquias historicas y los patrimonios culturales  saqueados por los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					  Nos enfrentaremos rotundamente con la lucha pannacional a la tergiversacion de la historia y la conspiracion de usurpar el islote Tok de Japon.
					
					  Desarrollemos fuertemente la lucha contra la rehabilitacion militarista de Japon y las maniobras injustas de represion a los coreanos residentes en este pais isleno.
					
					  Desplegaremos con energia las actividades solidarias pannacionales para rechazar y frenar la persecucion politica y la represion de DDHH de las autoridades japonesas contra los coreanos residentes en Japon, victimas de la dominacion colonial del pasado y sus descendientes, garantizar sus derechos nacionales y las actividades libres y  especialmente, defender la educacion nacional de sus hijos.
					
					  Las mujeres del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar abriran nueva fase para la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur y la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad uniendose firmemente bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					  Desplegaremos con mas dinamismo el movimiento por la paz anti-guerra contra todos los ejercicios belicos agresivos que amenazan la paz de esta tierra.

articles.title: Efectuada reunion nacional de funcionarios propagandistas de FGSC
articles.content:
Efectuada reunion nacional de funcionarios propagandistas de FGSC
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en la Casa Central de Obreros la reunion nacional de funcionarios propagandistas de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion los funcionarios de la rama interesada y de la FGSC, y los propagandistas ejemplares de la FGSC del centro y las localidades.
					
					Se dio lectura a la obra del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Anticipemos la victoria definitiva con una ofensiva ideologica revolucionaria".
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Hyon Sang Su, presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea.
					
					El dijo que en cada periodo y etapa de la revolucion, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il aclaro el camino a seguir por la FGSC y dirigio energicamente para que esa organizacion cumpla el papel de entidad de educacion ideologica.
					
					Puntualizo que las hazanas del Dirigente acumuladas en las labores de la FGSC brillan mas gracias al Mariscal.
					
					Anadio que el Mariscal ilumino la meta de lucha a tomar por la FGSC en la gran marcha de la nueva centuria y presento las tareas y los remedios para mejorar e intensificar la labor ideologica.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de promover la transformacion de toda la FGSC segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo tomando como inmortal programa el discurso del Mariscal pronunciado en la 8a Conferencia de Funcionarios Ideologicos del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Seguidamente, hubo intervenciones.
					
					Terminada la reunion, se impartio un cursillo.

articles.title: Se dinamiza en Corea el desarrollo especial
articles.content:
Se dinamiza en Corea el desarrollo espacial
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Ya transcurrio un ano desde cuando en el septimo periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema (en abril del ano pasado) quedo publicada la Ley de Desarrollo Espacial de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En el ano transcurrido, Corea desarrollo activamente esa labor para construir una potencia cosmica de talla mundial ejerciendo el derecho a desarrollar el cosmos con fines pacificos.
					
					La Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Espacial (ANDE) es el organo central de direccion estatal que proyecta y ejecuta el plan de desarrollo del cosmos e inspecciona y controla generalmente las labores de desarrollo. Hace gran contribucion a estas labores manteniendo el ideal y el principio de la RPDC de desarrollar el espacio con fines pacificos.
					
					Quedo instituido el emblema de la ANDE.
					
					En el aparecen las letras blancas de la "ANDE" y estan dibujados el Planeta verde, la Osa Mayor en el cielo, las letras azules de la "RPDC" en ingles, las otras blancas de la "ANDE" (NADA en ingles) y la orbita de satelite.
					
					La Osa Mayor describe la conviccion y la voluntad de los cientificos cosmicos de hacer brillar la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il como potencia cosmica.
					
					El color azul oscuro en el fondo del emblema demuestra el caracter del desarrollo del cosmos con fines pacificos de la RPDC y la orbita de satelite significa el proyecto de desarrollar el cosmos lanzando uno tras otro los satelites en todas las orbitas.
					
					En la Ley arriba mencionada se estipulan los principios de mantener estrictamente el caracter Juche y el de autososten, desarrollar el cosmos con fines pacificos y utilizar la ciencia y la tecnologia cosmicas para solucionar los indispensables problemas cientificos y tecnicos que se presentan en la construccion economica y la vida del pueblo.
					
					Y declaran los otros acerca de la posicion y el deber del organo estatal de la direccion del desarrollo espacial y la informacion sobre el lanzamiento de satelite, la garantia de seguridad, la investigacion del accidente y las medidas de socorro y la indemnizacion del dano.
					
					Tambien iluminan la posicion de principios de la RPDC de cooperar con las organizaciones internacionales y otros paises bajo el principio de igualdad, beneficio mutuo y ayuda reciproca, respetar las leyes y las normas internacionales relacionadas con el desarrollo y el uso del cosmos y rechazar la militarizacion del cosmos y la aplicacion de la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero en el dominio de actividades cosmicas.

articles.title: En Pyongyang el ministro de Industria y Agricultura de Mongolia y su comitiva
articles.content:
En Pyongyang el ministro de Industria y Agricultura de Mongolia y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Llegaron hoy a esta capital Khaltmaa Battulga, ministro de Industria y Agricultura, quien es titular de la parte de Mongolia para el Comite Intergubernamental de Consulta de Economia, Comercio, Ciencia y Tecnologia Corea-Mongolia, y su comitiva.
					Este dia, el gobierno de la RPDC ofrecio un banquete en honor de los huespedes mongoles.
